name: Ninetales
author: Hideaki Hakozaki
flavor_text: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.

abilities.name: Bright Look
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hexed Flame
attacks.effect: Does 50 more damage for each Special Condition affecting the Defending Pokémon.
